episode.title: Standard Pressed Steel Co. v. Department of Revenue of Wash.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion to announce in No. 73-1697, Standard Pressed Steel Company against the Department of Revenue of the State of Washington.
And I make this announcement on behalf of Mr. Justice Douglas.

For reasons stated in an opinion written by Mr. Justice Douglas and filed today with the clerk in which he request me to announce, the judgment of the Court of Appeals of the State of Washington is affirmed.
